p: The BLM movement also shone a light on the deep structural inequalities within rich countries like the US and UK and has well and truly debunked the idea that we live in a ‘post‐racial’ society. The disproportionate impact of Covid‐19 on communities of colour in the UK has also made it clear how those inequalities are magnified in a crisis. We can't build the mass climate movement that we know is necessary to force real political change unless we accept that there will be no climate justice without racial justice.
